header.text: MT is a way to learn music online with professional methods. You'll have access to theory, scores, etc. depending on your instrument. You'll learn the three pillars of music : Rythm, Technic and Harmony.
header.title: A new way to learn music.
Rythm
header.content: Rythm is where you got the groove. We'll decribe how time is mesured, noted and how to use it in music. Tic tic tic
